page.title: 15PEBMARSH CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: These are the games played by children of{Pebmarsh School.}Bowls,Piggy in the Middle,Badminton,Football,British Bulldog,Sticky Toffee,Tennis,Netball,Rounders,Rugby, It,Cards,Snakes and Ladders,Dominoes,Connect Four,Twister,Downfall,Mastermind,Cludo ,Monopoly,Operation,Snooker,Scrabble,S quash,and Spoons.The{most popular game for{boys}in school is{football.}The{ {girls' favourite}is{Rounders.}The most popular{indoor games}are{cards}and{ {dominoes. To play{Sticky Toffee,}people with whom you are playing,hold onto your fingers until you say something with 'sticky toffee'in.Then they run away.If the person who is 'it' catches you,you have to stand still with your legs apart until somebody crawls under your legs and sets you free.
